articles.title: Magic Portrait Spices Up Your Pixel's Lock Screen
articles.description: Magic Portrait on Android 16 adds different frames and weather effects to the Pixel lock screen for a more dynamic, personalized look.
articles.content: Google started rolling out Android 16 QPR1 Beta 1 to eligible Pixel devices, the same day it kicked off this years I/O event. The latest beta update brings a bunch of new features that are worth talk… [+2139 chars]

summary: Google's NotebookLM gets Video Overviews and duration control for Audio Overviews. Meghan Markle included rare photos of her and Prince Harry from their first year of romance. Magic Portrait on Android 16 adds different frames and weather effects to the Pixel lock screen.
